s: Summary: Rooftop networking mixer spotlighting Pharos mainnet launch and ANT Digital Technology roadmap.
Topics: real‑world asset tokenisation, cross‑chain bridges, mainnet governance, TradFi‑Web3 convergence, ecosystem incentives.
Speakers: Pharos core team, ANT CTO, representatives from 499 DAO, Hypernative Labs.
r: Gain early insight into Pharos mainnet technical milestones.
Identify partnership pipelines linking TradFi institutions to tokenised assets.
Connect with DAO leaders shaping decentralized governance standards.
